name: VILLAGE RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

address: 1335-A, Kurunji Illam, Kurunji Nagar, Near Sathya Nagar, Kondappanaikanpatty, Salem - 636 008

briefDescription: VILLAGE RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT PROJECT (VRDP) is a team long time Associates in Social action for more than three decades.  Mr A. Renganathan, a former schoolteacher, whose update of development is excellent, founded VRDP as a society in Salem district in 1984. It was duly registered under the State and Central Act for its legal entity with Reg. No. 100/84 dated 4.7.1984. It has also been registered with the Ministry of Home affairs under the FCR Act to receive foreign contribution with No. 076000057 dated 8.12.93. It has also registered with the Income Tax Department under section 12A, 80G and has obtained PAN AADFV6113G. The purpose of the organization is to empower the rural poor, especially the most exploited and oppressed lots of the Tribal, Dalit and Women..
